item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Christy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Christy add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "Remember, darkness does not always equate to evil, just as light does not always bring good." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Christy add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description:
"A hedgehog? And just how does a hedgehog make love?" he demanded.
No, I thought. I won't. I will not. But I did. "Very carefully," I replied, giggling helplessly. So now we know just how old that one is, I thought. " -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Christy add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "It's okay," I said soothingly. "You're just getting your stride back. Once you're up to full power, I'll go crack a rib or something so we can test it." She groaned. "The horrible part is that I don't think you're joking." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Christy add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "If there were an international butt competition, Eric would win, hands down—or cheeks up." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christy add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Did we have sex?" he asked directly. For about two minutes, this might actually be fun. "Eric," I said, "we had sex in every position I could imagine, and some I couldn’t. We had sex in every room in my house, and we had sex outdoors. You told me it was the best you’d ever had." (At the time he couldn’t recall all the sex he’d ever had. But he’d paid me a compliment.) "Too bad you can’t remember it," I concluded with a modest smile. Eric looked like I’d hit him in the forehead with a mallet. For all of thirty seconds his reaction was completely gratifying." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christy add a quote by Charlaine Harris
Christy add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Some might think you suicidal." "Well, 'some' can stick it up their ass." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christy add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "My bullshit meter is reading that as 'false'." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christy add a quote by Keri Arthur
item.description: "Which meant I got left with Quinn yet again. Given the time he was taking to make his decision, I wasn't exactly happy about that. I mean, putting me with him was like flashing chocolate my way then telling me I couldn't have it. It was just plain mean." -- Keri Arthur

item.title: Christy add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You will lose what you value most, so treasure it while you can." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Christy add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Don't worry, little dhampir. You might be surrounded by clouds, but you'll always be like sunshine to me." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Christy add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Vampires. Honestly, they're like children sometimes. " -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Christy add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Christy add a quote by Lewis Caroll
item.description: "If everybody minded their own business, the world would go around a great deal faster than it does." -- Lewis Caroll

item.title: Christy add a quote by Lewis Carroll
